ANU.name: Katherina Ng
ANU.biography: Kat is currently an honorary lecturer in Fenner School of Environment and Society.  She has a diverse, multidisciplinary research interests that include  invasive species, biosecurity, insect ecology, data science and applied  natural resource management.
